title: Roots Kitchen
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, International, Italian, Raw, Thai, Juice bar, Take-out, Fusion
description: Vegetarian restaurant serving fresh food in the Turku Markethall. Menu changes daily, vegan options always available. Many of the items are also gluten-free. Smoothies and fresh juices, raw cakes. Lunch includes in-house-made bread, fair trade coffee and tea.
